price: son un indicio de que recibirán Mis gracias [en esta vida y la futura]? Todo lo contrario, pero no se dan cuenta.
arabic: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِۚ بَل لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: nusāriʿu lahum fī al-khayrāti bal lā yashʿurūna
